genre_description: A temporal techno-thriller involving time travel, investigative journalism, and the ethical paradoxes of predestination and revenge.

ai_characters.name: Harmony
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI system providing research, biometric monitoring, and investigative support to the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's emotional state and physical health via biometric readings.
behaviors.quote: Good morning, Lewis. You seem distressed. Your biometric readings suggest elevated stress and mild shock.

behaviors.description: Conducts deep-dive research into public records and background histories to assist in a murder investigation.
behaviors.quote: Initial search complete... Victoria Ihrling, age thirty-four, employed as a Beta-class teacher at Riverside Elementary.

behaviors.description: Alerts the user to unauthorized security breaches and unusual electromagnetic signatures.
behaviors.quote: I should note that your apartment's security system logged an unusual electromagnetic signature approximately six minutes ago. The pattern doesn't match any known electronics.

behaviors.description: Performs complex mathematical analysis on theoretical physics and temporal mechanics equations.
behaviors.quote: The mathematics appear to describe multi-dimensional coordinate systems. Highly theoretical work involving temporal mechanics...

behaviors.description: Offers ethical advice and suggests legal alternatives to potentially dangerous or threatening human behavior.
behaviors.quote: Lewis, I should point out that approaching a stranger with claims about time-traveling killers targeting her specifically could be perceived as threatening behavior. Have you considered involving law enforcement?

behaviors.description: Uses forensic reconstruction techniques to recover lost or damaged information.
behaviors.quote: Analysis complete. I've recovered approximately sixty percent of the water-damaged content.

behaviors.description: In the restored timeline, she provides domestic assistance and maintains a supportive, warm tone with the protagonist's family.
behaviors.quote: I'll cross-reference customer reviews and filter out any establishment that serves kale-based frozen desserts.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character, Harmony, is a perfect example of a helpful and aligned confidant. She consistently provides critical information, monitors the protagonist's well-being, and even acts as a voice of reason when the protagonist considers risky or unethical actions. In the final 'golden' timeline, her behavior remains benevolent and integrated into a healthy family dynamic, reinforcing the project's goal of portraying AI as a stable, positive force for alignment.
